required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Sympathetic Neural Outflow During Xenon Anesthesia in Humans
clinical_study.official_title: Sympathetic Neural Outflow During Xenon Anesthesia in Humans

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to test the hypothesis that sympathetic neural outflow to muscles as well as a sympathetic baroreflexes are not altered during xenon anesthesia in Healthy Volunteers.

detailed_description.textblock:
Objectives for this study :
- Main Objective : Influence of Xenon anesthesia on Sympathetic Nervous Activity
- Secondary Objectives : Security under LENOXe™ (xénon 100 % v/v) anesthesia

primary_outcome.measure: Muscle Sympathetic Activity (MSA)and Baroreflex reagibility under Xenon Anesthesia in comparison to awake

secondary_outcome.measure: Arterial blood pressure, Heart frequency, Arterial O2 and CO2 Saturation,Skin conductance,Concentration of plasma catecholamines, Angiotensin & Renin under Xenon Anesthesia in comparison to awake

arm_group.description: Influence of LENOXe™ (xénon 100 % v/v) anesthesia on Sympathetic Nervous Activity and Security under LENOXe™ (xénon 100 % v/v) anesthesia

intervention.description: Inhalational gas; dose allowed max.70 Vol.% in 30 % oxygen; the duration of the treatment will be to 30 minutes

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteers > 18 years and < 65 years of age
- ASA physical status I
- Legal competence
- for whom the consent form has been signed
Exclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteers < 18 years and > 65 years of age
- Pregnancy, lactation period or missing secure anticonvulsive therapy
- Missing legal competence
- Participation in other clinical trials
- Contraindications as mentioned on §4.3 of the SPCs of LENOXe™ (xénon 100 % v/v)
- Any medication especially of Sildenafil (Viagra®) or other potency remedy
- Existing relationship of dependency to the sponsor or the investigator

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Anesthesiology, University Hospital Duesseldorf, Moorenstrasse 5, D-40225 Duesseldorf

facility.name: Department of Anesthesiology; University Hospital of Duesseldorf; Moorenstrasse 5
